revised_title: Acoustic Radiation from Plates into a Wedge-Shaped Fluid Region: Analysis and Applications
tldr: This article investigates the acoustic radiation from plates into a wedge-shaped fluid region, focusing on the flow of acoustic energy between adjacent subsystems. The author derives an expression for the radiation resistance per unit span for a general velocity distribution on the plate and provides detailed analysis for the simplest case. The results can be applied to estimate the flow of acoustic energy into the fluid for complex interacting structures, such as aircraft in air.
